entry.em: ..TORNADO WATCH 36 IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT SATURDAY

entry.data:
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
